bot_status_command_add_desc: Adds a status to the list. Status are cycled each 30 seconds.
bot_status_command_add_limit_reached: There are too many statuses added. Remove some of them.
bot_status_command_add_text_too_long: This status text is too long.
bot_status_command_add_status_added: You have added this status to the list.
bot_status_command_remove_desc: Removes a status from the list.
bot_status_command_remove_no_entries: There are no statuses added yet.
